improper_lock Specific Exception

Summary

CAUTION

This feature is deprecated and will be removed in the future.

Exception thrown by other library components.

Syntax

class improper_lock;

Header

#include "tbb/tbb_exception.h"

Description

improper_lock exception is thrown when a thread attempts to lock a critical_section or reader_writer_lock that it has already locked.

Members

namespace tbb {
        class improper_lock: public std::exception {
        public:
            const char* what() const throw();
        };
    }
Parent topic: Exceptions
